page.title: 10NOTTINGHAM LIFESTYLES
page.content: {FASHION.}Fashion is a thing that everyone knows about.Fashion is the kind of clothes we wear.Todays fashion is baggy trousers and long skirts. Last years fashion was mini-skirts. {POP.}Pop is music.The most popular groups are Wham, Duran-Duran,and Tears For Fears.The top 30 are put together from a survey of people. {HOTELS.}A hotel is a big house with lots of bedrooms and people go to stay for a week or weekend. {RESTAURANTS.}Restaurants are places where people go to eat.You can get French, German, Greek, Chinese and Italian restaurants. {CAFES.}Cafes are like little restaurants where people go to have their dinner. {BEAUTY.}People use lipstick, blusher, eye-liner, eyeshadow, and mascara to make themselves look prettier.
